become_host.text: Do you want to be[br]a host fisher?

book_now.text: Are you curious to learn all[br]the experiences TapAndFish[br]has to offer?

discover_estimate.text: Are you a fisher? Would you like to join TapAndFish's Team?[br]Sign up now as a professional or private charter and publish your first event!
discover_estimate.button: Learn more and estimate your profits

first_time.button: Book now an experience with our Ambassadors: they will share their secrets for breathtaking adventures!

forms.name: Name
forms.emailUsed: This email address is already in use
forms.emailConfirmationError: The two email addresses are not equal
forms.passwordError: The password must be at least 6 characters long and must include an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter and a number
forms.passwordConfirmationError: The two passwords are not equal
forms.acceptTerms: I do accept TapAndFish's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
forms.signupUnknownError: A major unknown exception has been raised during your registration. Please try again later, maybe after reloading the page. If the error persist please contact support
forms.signupSuccess: Your account has been created successfully, but it hasn't been verified yet. We've sent you an email with a link to complete the verification process. As soon as your account will be verified, you will be able to create or join trips
forms.signinUnknownError: A major unknown exception has been raised while trying to sign in. Please try again later, maybe after reloading the page. If the error persist please contact support
forms.recoverUnknownError: A major unknown exception has been raised during your registration. Please try again later, maybe after reloading the page. If the error persist please contact support
forms.recoverSuccess: If there is an account linked to this email address, a recovery link has been sent in order to reset the password.
forms.changePropicDescription:
Select an image from your device and upload it as your new profile picture.
PNG, JPEG are supported, maximum file size is 3MB
forms.changePropicUnknownError: A major unknown exception has been raised while trying to update your profile picture. Please try again later.
forms.changePropicSizeError: The provided image is too big, 3MB is maximum
forms.changePropicRatioError: The profile picture must be "sort of" squared
forms.changePropicFormatError: You can only upload PNG and JPEG files
forms.oldPasswordError: Your new password must be different from the old password.

verification.success: Your account has been successfully activated. Now you don't have any feature limitation
verification.already_done: Your account has already been activated
verification.error: The verification token is either wrong or expired. Please try sending another verification mail from your account page

verification.banner: Your account hasn't been verified yet so that some features have been blocked to you. Please check your email inbox for the verification link. If you need to resend the verification email, you can press the following button:
verification.sent: The verification email has been sent.
verification.sendError: An unexpected exception has been raised while sending the email. Please try again later.

info.title: Email settings
info.variousEmailsCheckbox: Receive offers, suggestions and various emails from the platform
info.importantEmailsCheckbox: Receive emails about new platform features, improvements and security updates
info.emailDisclaimer: You will still receive critical emails regarding your account security or changes in the Terms of Service. This cannot be disabled. If you wish to delete your account please contact us.
info.success: Your email settings has been successfully updated. If you changed your email remember that you have to verify the new one.
info.extremeError: A major unknown exception has been raised while updating your email settings. Please try again later, maybe after reloading the page. If the error persist please contact support.

sessions.title: Active sessions
sessions.description: The following list contains every active session on this account. If you see an unrecognized or suspicious session please revoke it. For security reasons we also suggest you to change your password immediately after.
sessions.extremeError: There was an error while trying to retrieve active sessions. Please try again later. If the problem persists please contact support.

revert.title: Restore account
revert.invalid: This link is invalid, if the problem persists please contact support.
revert.description: Please reset your password, so that no one can log in without authorization. We also suggest checking your details in case something was changed by someone.
revert.unknownError: A major unknown exception has been raised during your account recover. Please try again later, maybe after reloading the page. If the error persist please contact support

recover.title: Account recovery
recover.description: If you forgot your password, you can try recovering your account with your email address.
recover.error: A major unknown exception has been raised during your registration. Please try again later, maybe after reloading the page. If the error persist please contact support
recover.success: If there is an account linked to this email address, a recovery link has been sent in order to reset the password.
recover.resetDescription: Reset your password to access your account.

discover.description: Book your Private or your Professional Host Fisher all over the world, chose the best experience that fits your need and get ready for unique adventures

fullscreen.description: Find professional guides and private fishers. Next to you

private.title: Private Host Fisher:
private.description: Share the costs with a local Fisherman, a cheap solution for a great fishing day! It is very easy: find a buddy, chat with him, agree on the shared price and go fishing!

professional.title: Professional Guides and Charters:
professional.description: Tayloramade solutions for an unforgettable experience, meet our certified guides and discover new techniques
